deformablemesh.geometry

Class BinaryMomentsOfInertia

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.geometry.BinaryMomentsOfInertia

  • public class BinaryMomentsOfInertia
extends Object
    This class is designed to use the binary representation to calculate the center of mass and moments of inertia Created on 23.08.17.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryMomentsOfInertia(DeformableMesh3D mesh, MeshImageStack stack)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] getCenterOfMass()
      center of mass: c_x = sum_i [x_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i] c_y = sum_i[ y_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i] c_z = sum_i[ z_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i]
      List<double[]> getEigenVectors()
      Returns the list of eigen vectors, and the eigen values.

    • Method Detail

      • getCenterOfMass

        public double[] getCenterOfMass()
        center of mass: c_x = sum_i [x_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i] c_y = sum_i[ y_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i] c_z = sum_i[ z_i m_i] / sum_i [m_i]
        Returns:
        {c_x, c_y, c_z}

      • getInertialMatrix

        public double[] getInertialMatrix()
        Moments of inertia. Ixx = sum_i [x_ix_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i] Ixy = sum_i [x_iy_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i] Ixz = sum_i [x_iz_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i] Iyx = Ixy Iyy = sum_i [y_iy_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i] Iyz = sum_i [y_iz_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i] Izx = Ixz Izy = Iyz Izz = sum_i [z_iz_im_i]/ sum_i [m_i]
        Returns:
        { Ixx, Ixy, Ixz, Iyx, Iyy, Iyz, Izx, Izy, Izz};

      • getEigenVectors

        public List<double[]> getEigenVectors()
        Returns the list of eigen vectors, and the eigen values.
        Returns:
        [ {v1}, {v2}, {v3}, {lambda1, lambda2, lambda3} ]
